sqlMap.select: select sum(sales_goal) from daily_plan dp inner join weekly_plan wp on dp.WEEKLY_PLAN_ID = wp.WEEKLY_PLAN_ID where trunc(monday) = (TRUNC(sysdate, 'DAY') +1) and emp_id = #empId#

select B.dept_id, B.emp_id, B.emp_name, B.weekly_plan_id, B.reg_date, B.title, to_char(B.monday, 'yyyy/mm/dd~')||to_char(B.monday+4, 'yyyy/mm/dd') monday, B.checked from (select rownum as rnum, A.dept_id, A.emp_id, A.emp_name, A.weekly_plan_id, A.reg_date, A.title, A.monday, A.checked from (select e.dept_id, e.emp_id, e.emp_name, w.weekly_plan_id, w.reg_date, w.title, w.monday, w.checked from WEEKLY_PLAN w, EMPLOYEE e where e.emp_id=w.emp_id AND e.emp_id=#empId# order by reg_date DESC) A where rownum <= #rownum#+10) B where rnum > #rownum#

select B.dept_id, B.emp_id, B.emp_name, B.weekly_plan_id, B.reg_date, B.title, to_char(B.monday, 'yyyy/mm/dd~')||to_char(B.monday+4, 'yyyy/mm/dd') monday, B.checked from (select rownum as rnum, A.dept_id, A.emp_id, A.emp_name, A.weekly_plan_id, A.reg_date, A.title, A.monday, A.checked from (select e.dept_id, e.emp_id, e.emp_name, w.weekly_plan_id, w.reg_date, w.title, w.monday, w.checked from EMPLOYEE e, WEEKLY_PLAN w where e.emp_id=w.emp_id AND e.dept_id=#deptId# order by reg_date DESC) A where rownum <= #rownum# + 10) B where rnum > #rownum#

select B.dept_id, B.emp_id, B.emp_name, B.weekly_plan_id, B.reg_date, B.title, to_char(B.monday, 'yyyy/mm/dd~')||to_char(B.monday+4, 'yyyy/mm/dd') monday, B.checked from (select rownum as rnum, A.dept_id, A.emp_id, A.emp_name, A.weekly_plan_id, A.reg_date, A.title, A.monday, A.checked from (select e.dept_id, e.emp_id, e.emp_name, w.weekly_plan_id, w.reg_date, w.title, w.monday, w.checked from EMPLOYEE e, WEEKLY_PLAN w where e.emp_id=w.emp_id AND e.dept_id=#deptId# AND w.monday=#monday# order by reg_date) A where rownum <= #rownum# + 10) B where rnum > #rownum#
select count(*) as cnt from EMPLOYEE e, WEEKLY_PLAN w where e.emp_id=w.emp_id AND e.dept_id=#deptId#
select count(*) as cnt from EMPLOYEE e, WEEKLY_PLAN w where e.emp_id=w.emp_id AND e.emp_id=#empId#
select count(*) as cnt from EMPLOYEE e, WEEKLY_PLAN w where e.emp_id=w.emp_id AND e.dept_id=#employee.dept.deptId# AND w.monday=#monday#

select w.weekly_plan_id, d.dept_name, e.emp_id, e.emp_name, w.title, w.reg_date, to_char(w.monday, 'yy/MM/dd') monday from WEEKLY_PLAN w, EMPLOYEE e, DEPT d where w.emp_id=e.emp_id AND e.dept_id=d.dept_id AND w.weekly_plan_id=#weeklyPlanId#

select DISTINCT w.weekly_plan_id, e.emp_id, e.emp_name, d.dept_name, w.reg_date, w.title, to_char(w.monday, 'yyyy/mm/dd~')||to_char(w.monday+4, 'yyyy/mm/dd') monday, sum(p.sales_goal) over(partition by p.weekly_plan_id) sales_goal_sum, NVL((select sum(profit) from daily_report r, daily_plan p, weekly_plan w where w.weekly_plan_id=p.weekly_plan_id AND r.emp_id=w.emp_id AND p.plan_date=r.reg_date AND w.weekly_plan_id=#weeklyPlanId#), 0) profit_sum, ROUND((select sum(profit) from daily_report r, daily_plan p, weekly_plan w where w.weekly_plan_id=p.weekly_plan_id AND r.emp_id=w.emp_id AND p.plan_date=r.reg_date AND w.weekly_plan_id=#weeklyPlanId#) * 100 / sum(p.sales_goal)over(partition by p.weekly_plan_id), 2) || '%' as achievement from WEEKLY_PLAN w, EMPLOYEE e, DEPT d, daily_plan p where w.emp_id=e.emp_id AND e.dept_id=d.dept_id AND w.weekly_plan_id=#weeklyPlanId# AND w.weekly_plan_id=p.weekly_plan_id
select w.weekly_plan_id from WEEKLY_PLAN w, EMPLOYEE e where w.emp_id=e.emp_id AND w.monday=#monday# AND e.emp_id=#employee.empId#

select DISTINCT e.emp_name, d.plan_date, e.emp_id from EMPLOYEE e, WEEKLY_PLAN w, DAILY_PLAN d, Plan p where e.emp_id=w.emp_id AND w.WEEKLY_PLAN_ID=d.WEEKLY_PLAN_ID AND p.daily_plan_id=d.daily_plan_id AND e.dept_id=#deptId#

select p.content, d.plan_date, e.emp_name from WEEKLY_PLAN w,DAILY_PLAN d, PLAN p, EMPLOYEE e where w.weekly_plan_id=d.weekly_plan_id AND w.emp_id=e.emp_id AND p.daily_plan_id=d.daily_plan_id AND w.emp_id=#weeklyPlan.employee.empId#
